sentences.en: A few schools now offer counselling sessions; all have some system of pastoral care.
sentences.cn: 一些学校现在开设咨询课；所有学校都有某种教导关怀体制。

sentences.en: his pastoral work among the congregation
sentences.cn: 他在教堂会众中的牧灵工作

sentences.en: It was a very old house, beautifully situated in pastoral surroundings.
sentences.cn: 那是一年古老的房子.周围环境幽静,颇具田园风情.

sentences.en: Many churches provide excellent pastoral counselling.
sentences.cn: 很多教堂提供出色的牧灵辅导。

sentences.en: Most of the pastoral songs in Hunan are an tiphonal singings.
sentences.cn: 盘歌多七言六句体,不少有“歌头”.

sentences.en: Pastoral people are among the most vulnerable in the modern world.
sentences.cn: 畜牧民族是现在世界上最易受到侵害的民族.

sentences.en: Q .5 Which books in Bible are in the catalog of Pastoral Letters?
sentences.cn: 问题5.教牧书信包括圣经的哪几卷书?

sentences.en: Roadside tea and tablets as grain, pastoral scene, increasinglyshi wai tao yuan.
sentences.cn: 路边为成片茶园及谷物, 田园景象, 胜似世外桃园.

sentences.en: Sometimes in parishes, Pastoral Councils are not well known.
sentences.cn: 在堂区, 有时牧民议会不是众所周知的.

sentences.en: The ancient vase was painted with pastoral scenes.
sentences.cn: 这古老的花瓶上绘饰着田园景色.

sentences.en: The difficult road allow every member of the pastoral people feel great.
sentences.cn: 行路的艰难让每一位牧区人感慨万分.

sentences.en: The priest makes pastoral visits every Tuesday.
sentences.cn: 牧师每星期二作履行神职的访问.

sentences.en: This idyllic pastoral scene is only part of the picture.
sentences.cn: 这充满诗意的田园景色只是画面的一角.

sentences.en: Tourists into the real nature of the pastoral experience of music.
sentences.cn: 让游客真正融入大自然、体会田园之乐.

sentences.en: Trace an analogy between pastoral poetry and landscape painting.
sentences.cn: 找出田园诗和风景画之间的相似之处.

sentences.en: When she first came to this pastoral area, she found life here a bit difficult to get used to.
sentences.cn: 她刚来牧区的时候, 生活上感到有点别扭.

words.tran_cn: 牧师的；牧人的；田园生活的；乡村的

trans.tran_cn: 牧师的，主教的，牧人的，有关田园生活的，乡村的
trans.tran_en: relating to the duties of a priest, minister etc towards the members of their religious group
